# commands

**Instance Property**

The commands associated with the extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var commands: [WKWebExtension.Command] { get }
```

## Discussion

Provides all commands registered within the extension. Each command represents an action or behavior available for the web extension.

## Related Documentation

- **performCommand(_:)**: Performs the specified command, triggering events specific to this extension.
